segment.source: General Tab
segment.target: General Tab

segment.source: General Tab
segment.target: General Tab

segment.source: General Tab
segment.target: General Tab

segment.source: Use the General tab to configure options for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.
segment.target: Use the General tab to configure options for Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.

segment.source: Scratch Directory
segment.target: Scratch Directory

segment.source: Specifies the path to the location where the Sequencer will temporarily save files generated during sequencing.
segment.target: Specifies the path to the location where the Sequencer will temporarily save files generated during sequencing.

segment.source: The default path is C:Program FilesMicrosoft Application Virtualization SequencerScratch.
segment.target: The default path is C:Program FilesMicrosoft Application Virtualization SequencerScratch.

segment.source: To specify a new path, click Browse.
segment.target: To specify a new path, click Browse.

segment.source: Log Directory
segment.target: Log Directory

segment.source: Specifies the path to the directory where the Sequencer will save log files.
segment.target: Specifies the path to the directory where the Sequencer will save log files.

segment.source: The default path is C:Program FilesMicrosoft Application Virtualization SequencerLogs.
segment.target: The default path is C:Program FilesMicrosoft Application Virtualization SequencerLogs.

segment.source: To specify a new path, click Browse
segment.target: To specify a new path, click Browse

segment.source: Allow Use of MSI Installer
segment.target: Allow Use of MSI Installer

segment.source: Select this option to allow interaction between the Sequencer and the application installer.
segment.target: Select this option to allow interaction between the Sequencer and the application installer.

segment.source: This option is selected by default.
segment.target: This option is selected by default.

segment.source: Allow Virtualization of Events
segment.target: Allow Virtualization of Events

segment.source: Select this option to allow low-level operating system activities of the application to be virtualized when a sequenced application package is run on App-V Desktop Clients.
segment.target: Select this option to allow low-level operating system activities of the application to be virtualized when a sequenced application package is run on App-V Desktop Clients.

segment.source: This option is selected by default.
segment.target: This option is selected by default.

segment.source: Allow Virtualization of Services
segment.target: Allow Virtualization of Services

segment.source: Select this option to allow services required by the application to be virtualized when the application is run on App-V Desktop Clients.
segment.target: Select this option to allow services required by the application to be virtualized when the application is run on App-V Desktop Clients.

segment.source: This option is selected by default.
segment.target: This option is selected by default.

segment.source: Append Package Version to Filename
segment.target: Append Package Version to Filename

segment.source: Select this option to automatically append the sequenced application package version number to the file name.
segment.target: Select this option to automatically append the sequenced application package version number to the file name.

segment.source: This option is selected by default.
segment.target: This option is selected by default.

segment.source: OK
segment.target: OK

segment.source: Saves changes and closes the dialog box.
segment.target: Saves changes and closes the dialog box.

segment.source: Cancel
segment.target: Cancel

segment.source: Exits the dialog box without saving any changes.
segment.target: Exits the dialog box without saving any changes.

segment.source: Apply
segment.target: Apply

segment.source: Saves the changes and remains in the dialog box.
segment.target: Saves the changes and remains in the dialog box.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencer Options Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencer Options Dialog Box
